title: SNAPCHAT IS GREAT!!!!
text: So luv Snapchat so so so so much! Out of all the apps I have gotten, best by one by far! Snapchat is totally a safe and non toxic place if you use it the right way. A lot of parents say no to Snapchat for kids under 13, but I have some tips to help change your mind. 1. If your worried about snap map, one ANWSER. Ghost mode. It completely turns off your location for everyone! Super helpful for your child‚Äôs safety. 2. Snapping friends. If your worried about your child sending pictures to random people, you can simply ignore friend request you don‚Äôt know, and promise to only snap your friends! 3. Last thing, I promise. Not looking at spotlight page, or other stories. That is the only thing that could be toxic or appropriate thing on this social app. Overall, this app has no many highs, and very little lows! Hopefully this was very helpful, download Snapchat today!

title: What happened to my bitmoji.
text: i think it‚Äôs very rude how you got rid of my adorable, sweet looking, loveable bitmoji. one day i wake up and my 2D avatar that i would admire every day, was changed to a 3D piece of crap. i eventually learned to tolerate her by putting her in a bomb outfit and all was well. then, i see one of my friends stories that her bitmoji was ruined. I thought to myself, ‚Äúthat could never happen to me right?‚Äù i was wrong. a week passes and nothing changed and i was so thankful. i would still check my bitmoji daily still in denial i will never get hit with the disgusting bitmoji curse. today, i was having the worst day ever. i got extremely sick, its my time of the month all that fun stuff. i come home. open my snapchat and i am greeted by an alien. i panic. i tried to fix it i went to the bitmoji editing and i open the app to see certain outfits cost COINS. i start to question what app im on. i even check to make sure. i keep trying to fit my once perfect bitmoji and nothing works. i am very dissapointed in this update. i want my bitmoji back. i‚Äôm distressed. this is worse then the twitter logo update.

title: Love it but hate it
text: I love snap but I also hate it I‚Äôve had snap since 2016. It‚Äôs an everyday use for me, it has a lot of my memories in it. But just recently I was temporarily disable for logging in and out of my snap because I was helping my friend do her streaks while her phone was broken and apparently that was ‚Äúsuspicious activity‚Äù and I‚Äôm now temporarily disabling for using it on my phone. It‚Äôs been almost a week and I‚Äôve contacted Snapchat 2 times and I still have to reply. I‚Äôve tried everything that they say in there little articles but non of it works. I was told I should be able to get back in after 24-48 hours. But yet it‚Äôs been almost a week and no luck. Apparently this is a bug that has been needed to be fixed for awhile now and they still haven‚Äôt. I‚Äôm very upset that I‚Äôm still not able to get in to my account on my phone. I think it‚Äôs dumb how they haven‚Äôt had this bug fixed when it‚Äôs happened for years and how they don‚Äôt reply when needed assistance.

title: Snapchat bans
text: I‚Äôve been a loyal user of snapchat since 2016 and never had any issues with it until recently. I guess if you violate any terms and conditions in the slightest way they‚Äôll just go ahead and delete the whole account with no further explanation and nothing you can do about it. In my case I was banned for ‚Äúprohibited drug content‚Äù after not having my phone all day from losing it, i appealed the decision and explained that i didn‚Äôt even know what got me banned and that i hadn‚Äôt been on my phone at all that day but was still denied with no way of contacting them further, i will say this is the worst customer support i‚Äôve ever experienced with any app, which is surprising because it‚Äôs such a huge platform. Now i‚Äôve lost all the people I had on there that I don‚Äôt have phone numbers to and years of memories‚Ä¶can‚Äôt even make a new account. So if you use snapchat make sure you aren‚Äôt relying on anything in the app because they will wrongfully ban you and give you nothing to work with. So sad this is how they treat the people that have been using and supporting the app since the beginning.

title: Ran by BOTS
text: At first snapchat was my favorite app it was a safe keep for my memories it was a way of communicating and getting out my shell until they permanently locked my account my first and only accounts they couldn‚Äôt even tell me what I violated when I see people posting inappropriate things everyday and still have their accounts while me I was working and my account just was locked than they wouldn‚Äôt even let me get my data from the account I still don‚Äôt know why my account was taken I‚Äôm still trying to get it back I have cried and broke down and try to reach out to snap all they could say is they can‚Äôt unlock my acc and now I can‚Äôt even make a new one or use the app I kept getting a response from one of their bots I need to speak to someone a real person snapchat was once my home a safe place but not it‚Äôs the reason I have none of my memories a app that begun my depression I just want all my photos I just want my account back and the availability to use the app if you have any way of helping me please reach out to me

title: horrific support
text: first and foremost, the ‚Äòsupport‚Äô team is just awful. i had to send SEVERAL emails about someone using my email and they all but refused to do something until i raised a huge fuss about privacy issues. then, i needed to change the phone number associated with my account as my number was going to be changed but the app just wouldn‚Äôt let me. tried to reach support then and almost the exact same response but with zero results and ultimately had to delete the entire account because they straight up told me they wouldn‚Äôt do anything and couldn‚Äôt help. 5+ years worth of memories having to be transferred to a google drive and having to go through my entire contact list to tell them to add my new account. they followed that support request up with saying they were not going to be responding to any further emails from me about the issue. tldr; if you ever plan on changing your phone number or just generally needing support on bugs, issues, and privacy problems with someone else using your email address without your permission, do not expect to get any help whatsoever.

title: 5 years of memories lost
text: I‚Äôve had Snapchat since 2017, I woke up one day and it said my account was deactivated so I tried to log back in but it said it was permanently locked, my friends texted me on another app to ask me if I blocked them but I didn‚Äôt. I tried making a new account but it kept on being glitchy and saying ‚Äúsomething went wrong try again later‚Äù so I swiped out of the app and clicked it again and it look me back to the log in/sign up screen, so I tried to log back into my new account I just made but it said ‚Äúaccount not found,‚Äù I found out that once your account is permanently locked, you can‚Äôt make a new account on that device. I still like Snapchat and still use it on my old phone but it‚Äôs becoming a hassle, Snapchat needs to fix this and find a way to get my account back because I had 5 years of memories on that, from 4th grade to 10th, I had memories of my friends and family that I will never get back, Snapchat is stupid and I cannot believe this happened to me in just one night and now all my memories from the past 5 years are gone.

title: New Bitmoji has to go.
text: It has to go. It‚Äôs not relevant, it‚Äôs ugly, no one likes it. The new Bitmoji has no future. No one likes it, my friends have had panic attacks on it. Remove it, it‚Äôs stupid and ugly. Whoever fixed the art style is a horrible artist. Another thing, the AI is stupid. We have chat gpt so what is the point of the ai? It‚Äôs weird and knows my location even when im on ghost mode. Please remove these concerns or else I will convince many people to remove the app. I will no longer stand for these changes. Stop trying to be trendy Snapchat. It‚Äôs stupid, and you‚Äôre not improving anything positively. If you‚Äôre really team Snapchat, brainstorm some sort of fix, change, anything that isn‚Äôt what it is today.

title: Hmm.
text: I‚Äôve been using Snapchat since the beginning and have loved how easy it has made for me to communicate with friends & family in a much easier hassle free way! That I have loved! However a little over a week ago I went to get on Snapchat as normal and was signed out, upon attempting to log back in I was given a message saying my account has been permanently banned.. like really!!! I figured it was just something with the app itself but nope still won‚Äôt do a dang thing. I proceeded to search for hours on how to contact Snapchat but to my avail a company as large as this one does have have good solid communication centers to deal with issues when they arise for its users, and that saddens me. What saddens me more is I reached out over twitter and absolutely nothing, I had photos saved to my memories from family & friends that have passed or I no longer have contact with. And as of today as still currently locked out of my account with absolutely no idea why. Sad sad sad!

title: Dear Snapchat
text: Dear Snapchat, Can you make the app available where you can watch snap stories on the Apple watch as well as be able to reply to snap messages on the Apple watch? It would be very helpful. Another suggestion I have for Snapchat that would be to make the DM messaging experience a little more user-friendly by adding the Edit message button in DMs. Can we be honest here? Nobody is perfect by any means and it can be pretty embarrassing to accidently send someone the wrong word or message to the wrong person or whoever your chatting with and to correct the mistake you have to send a whole new message. Wouldn't it be easier for everyone if you could edit and fix the error in the first place with the original message? Think about it for a minute; how do you personally feel when this type of thing happens to you?

title: Longtime user with multiple complaints.
text: Snapchat should completely get rid of the discover page, which constantly suggests explicit or sexual mixed content on an app that has many minors (middle school, high school) and other children. title: bug that won‚Äôt get fixed
text: I was on snapchat about a week ago and was trying to send a snap to my friend, it wouldn‚Äôt go through and the whole app was glitching. I figured that I just didn‚Äôt have good service and that was causing the issues. Suddenly my phone turned black and when it turned back on, it was the login page of snapchat. I was confused, but tried to log back in. When I tried to log back in, a message popped up saying my account was locked for violation of community guidelines. I had not posted anything or send anything that would be considered inappropriate or harmful. I tried to resolve this issue through snapchat‚Äôs support page. The resolution was an email from snapchat saying they could not unlock my account. I have tried to make various new accounts and nothing has worked. My phone is now banned from being able to use the app or create an account. I will make sure everyone knows how terrible the support is from snapchat and that nobody else tries to creates an account until this issue is fixed and I get my snapchat account back.

title: I love Snapchat but wish there was a way to turn off quick add
text: I enjoy almost every aspect of Snapchat. However, I really don‚Äôt enjoy having a list of random people recommended to me under quick add. There is no way to turn this off, none at all. There are ways to make it ‚Äúgo away‚Äù but it‚Äôs for maybe a day, if that. I can make it to where, ME, MYSELF, can not be seen by others on quick add, but what if I don‚Äôt want a list of strangers recommended to me? Why is that a thing? None of these people even have mutual friends with me, they are complete strangers and there‚Äôs like a 10 year age gap with some which is just odd to me and sets up victims for predators. Please fix this Snapchat, please make this feature optional. I‚Äôve looked online and several other people are saying the same thing. Idk why this is even a thing‚Ä¶if I want to add someone on snap, I will add them myself. Please fix this, it‚Äôs so annoying!

title: Love the app but I have two suggestions
text:
I‚Äôve been using Snapchat since 2021 and I love it. I only have two suggestions for future updates. 1. Please add a section within someone‚Äôs profile page where they can add a bio about themself, similar to Facebook or Instagram. This is probably one of my two biggest requests for Snap. My second suggestion is when someone adds you, and they have mutual friends with you, I would love to see a list of mutual friends that I share with the person who added me. My biggest one is definitely adding a Bio section for normal snap chatters, not just snap stars. This would make someone‚Äôs profile more recognizable, and would make it easier to know who is adding you or vice Versa. 

Overall I love snap but these are just my suggestions and I would love to see these in future updates. Keep up the great work guys!

title: Forcing users to pay to remove My AI
text: I have never reviewed an app, but your recent idea to create a new revenue stream by forcing users to pay for Snapchat+ to remove a ‚Äòfeature‚Äô they do not want borders on unethical. It is as if you know many if not most users do not want to see it at the top of their Friends and Chat lists, so you will now demand they pay you $2.50 a month to remove it. I have never interacted with My AI, yet it sits at the top of my Chat list ahead of all the real people I want in my life, and there‚Äôs no way to even clear it from my list of chats. Seriously? I have to see that ugly My AI at the top of my Chat list every time I open it? I also find it interesting that you do not have ‚ÄòRemove My AI‚Äô under the list of Snapchat+ features. I have no issues spending my money each month to pay for things I want, but to force me to pay for a ‚Äòfeature‚Äô I do not want‚Ä¶do you see the problem? Again, this is an awful business decision that borders on unethical. Maybe you should get your well-paid executives together and rethink the way your app can make money.

title: Snapchat updates ‚ú®
text:
I love Snapchat, it‚Äôs one of my main communication/social media devices I use. I don‚Äôt however love how the updates continue to add things on the screens where they start to cover the actual snaps themselves. 
The most recent update, every snap I get now it has a thick gray box on the bottom for ‚Äúreplying a message‚Äù to the snapper that sent the snap, but it‚Äôs quite annoying when you have a big box covering the bottom of the screen. This particular comment box used to be transparent and you could still see the snaps behind the box. But it just seems like more things get added to the screens every update, and idk if anyone else feels this way or not, but I find it kind of annoying. There is already a way to comment to someone, or reply, or snap. You don‚Äôt need a whole other box on top of someone‚Äôs snap picture/video to remind you to comment or reply..

title: Regulated Options
text: As A.I makes its appearance into our daily lives. Snapchat and it‚Äôs creators have taken the opportunity to force their version of A.I onto their users. Instead of giving each user the opportunity to make their own decision on allowing A.I into their daily lives and having access to your personal data, Snapchat has made that decision for you. A.I current state is only developmental at best meaning that they am the entire world in this world of technology have no idea on how this will impact current and future lives. This A.I has already been caught in lies and shown to have access to location even though it was said that it doesn‚Äôt. Regardless if it saves this information or not, in real time at any time in moment it will and can locate your exact location. Please make it an option for all users to make their own decision on the use of A.I. Putting a paywall just to clear it from the chat feed is not a solution. It is greed. Give us the option to completely turn its access off to our personal data on the app and on the phone.

title: very confused
text: I‚Äôve been using Snapchat for 4 years and I‚Äôve never had a problem with it. I used it for talking with friends and giving the insight on my story. However, 2 months ago my account got temporarily disabled. I‚Äôve been patiently waiting for Snapchat to resolve this issue but they never did. I‚Äôve contacted the team and they never got back to me. I understand they may be busy but I have so many memories on that app. The only way I can access my account is by another phone or my PC. They wouldn‚Äôt even tell me what it is that I did wrong on my account for it to get disabled. I‚Äôm very upset about the whole situation. I feel bad for my friends because I ask them to do my streaks for me on their phone. They don‚Äôt seem to have a problem with it but I would rather do my streaks on my own phone. I just want my account back. They should give you a few warning before they disable your account. They also should tell you WHAT you did wrong.

title: Snapchat AI
text: I never understood why they would roll this feature out to the masses. If it‚Äôs a experimental beta test I am not a beta version tester for certain features if I was apart of that program I‚Äôd understand being put in that pool of users to test a feature out but since I am not apart of that program I DO NOT want to test experimental beta features. I‚Äôve seen hundreds of tweets from the people complaining about the same issues we are all having with this app. No one asked for this, I do not want this on my phone, location privacy concerns, intellectual property that I do not request to give. I want an option to remove this feature that I did not sign up for. I do not care if people interact with it and that some people could use a ‚Äúfriend‚Äù but I am not okay with it being forced upon me and my friends. And the fact that you have to PAY MONEY to be able to remove a feature is absurd I will be deleting Snapchat until they remove this feature or give users the ability to remove an OPT Out of said feature. Been a user since 2015 but not no more.

title: It‚Äôs a good app but‚Ä¶
text: Look this is a really good app. It‚Äôs a great way to communicate with friends and peers and has a fun aspect with the filters and all that. Now with that, this is a 5 star app no complaints. But the on problem I have is, you guessed it, the Bitmoji‚Äôs. COME ON!! The Bitmoji‚Äôs were perfect when they were actual Bitmoji‚Äôs not this 3d stuff! I really don‚Äôt understand why you guys changed them in the first place and continue to change them even more even though almost everyone is saying they don‚Äôt like the Bitmoji‚Äôs. I understand it‚Äôs one little thing, but the Bitmoji‚Äôs are how we express ourselves and show who we want to look like. I would say for the happiness and sake for basically everyone who has Snapchat downloaded, fix the Bitmoji‚Äôs. When you fix them so they don‚Äôt look as bad or put them back to normal, this will be a 5 star app but for now it‚Äôll stay at 4 stars.

title: My AI, Avatars, and InApp Popup messages
text:
I literally have tried everything to get rid of that stupid AI, people *guys* mainly just abuse it and say stupid crap to it or send weird things, like i don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs adds anything to the app at all. It‚Äôs just strange, like i don‚Äôt understand its purpose and it‚Äôs never used by me or any of my friends. 

 The new avatars are so ugly its remarkable. the jump to 3d models in the first place was rough, but they looked pretty nice so we all rolled with it and ended up really liking what you could do with them. uhm this recent change though, it‚Äôs frankly really ugly. none of the poses work right with certain hair lengths, the poses look weird now. the face.. just ugh. it‚Äôs bad. a complete revert to what we had before would be VERY much appreciated from the vast majority of users!! 

  I have pressed ‚Äòx‚Äô so many times on those messages like ‚Äújoin your college‚Äù ‚Äúadd your school‚Äù .. i‚Äôm not in college at the moment, therefore would love to not be reminded of that every day when it pops up lol and i understand promoting the premium side of the app but like if we haven‚Äôt gotten it yet, i highly doubt most of us will. we‚Äôve been fine with how snap works since at least 2014.

 I love using snapchat, and you‚Äôre pretty much the only app of your kind, but these are just issues i think a lot of us need fixing. oh and please fix the news portion on the stories tab - it‚Äôs so spammy and hard to see your actual subscriptions. thanks for all y'all do.

title: Love Snapchat but there needs to be a huge change
text: Snapchat has been amazing till this year. I‚Äôve used it forever and love it and use it as a main source of talking to my friends. There is one thing that needs to change. As this world is changing and kids are finding out ways to get on Snapchat with a different age and us young and older teens are using Snapchat more and more I have a concern with the MyAI. Snapchat wants to keep privacy a priority but giving the AI to everyone is not safe. Allowing the location to be seen is not safe and not ok for us young teens. Snapchat needs to fix this asap. It‚Äôs having more and more people worried about people stalking us and making sure this community is safe. This isn‚Äôt ok now I will not be delete if snap but this problem does need to be fixed ASAP. I have written a complaint once through the app and many times through AI. Snapchat let‚Äôs fix this and gain back making privacy and safety a main priority.

title: Snapchat support WONT ANSWER

Lost access to my go to camera app. Lost access to my go to communication app. Even changed the password, updated my phone, deleted the app, and redownloaded it and it still won‚Äôt let me log back in at all. Waiting for them to fix this. And until then I‚Äôm rating the app 1 star. I should‚Äôve gotten a response from support by now. All of my memories are gone if I can‚Äôt get back into my account. And if it‚Äôs a device issue‚Ä¶ I shouldn‚Äôt have to buy a new phone to be able to use my account. Fix this please.

title: Support System Needs a Fix!
text: My account was permanently locked, meaning I cannot log back into that account or make any new accounts. Due to this problem whenever I email the Support Team I never get an email back about what can be done (such as allowing me to make a different account). Every email I have sent about my concerns was immediately followed up with an automated email about how I cannot get my account back although that‚Äôs not what I was emailing about in the first place. With college coming around the corner I will suffer immensely due to the fact that Snapchat is the main form of communication on any college campus. I hope that Team Snapchat sees this and follows up with an email and an expiration for why my account was permanently locked without a warning or a temporary lock first. I am now stuck with no Snapchat and no chance to get a new Snapchat. I‚Äôm very disappointed in how the support system is set up, it needs a change. I have sent 20+ emails with concerns about what to do and what happened with no response other than the confirmation email.

title: Invasive AI bot
text: The AI bot is creepy and I do not want it on my phone. It is also programmed to lie about how to remove it from the app by giving you instructions to a removal option that doesn‚Äôt exist. I refuse to implement artificial intelligence into my life ESPECIALLY in the form of ‚Äúfriendship.‚Äù I have learned that you can pay money to remove the spy bot from the app. Just tell me that instead of sending me to a dead end with no option to remove it. I use Snapchat daily and have always loved the app, I even learned to accept the advertisements and garbage celebrities that I don‚Äôt care about on the story page. I will not accept having artificial intelligence forced down my throat for corporate gain or whatever the objective behind the AI project is. I don‚Äôt need a ‚Äúdigital friend‚Äù to cry to so Snapchat can build a better ad profile on me. Get real and respect people‚Äôs privacy, regardless of how hard you guys get off on collecting personal data. Snapchat is one of the last social media platforms I use, and I will give snap a couple more weeks before I decide to live the rest of my life without it.

title: we need to put an end to this ‚úä

title: Love this app but it‚Äôs got some issues
text:
I‚Äôve used Snapchat for many years, since the launch of stories. Its been my go to choice for social media, but there are some gripes I have that I‚Äôve encountered over the years.
Firstly, the ads/news. I feel like Snapchat would benefit greatly from having less ads between my friend‚Äôs stories. I understand that this app has to be monetized to keep the company afloat, but the frequency they come up is kinda ridiculous. Also, snap news is a mess and I‚Äôm not really a big fan of that feature.
My second real gripe is recent. The ring flash has become the default flash on my front facing camera. It just doesn‚Äôt perform as well as the original flash, and the fact that I now have to click out of it whenever I want to take a picture using the old school flash is kinda frustrating and makes it take longer for me to send my snaps. Please just put the default flash back where it belongs :(

title: Snapchat or trash-chat

title: Unsafe Update
text: I have used snapchat since 2018 and loved that app for many years. But the updates keep getting worse. The new update called MyAi. At first I was i interested until i realized it is a bot that is getting information. I started talking to it and I was curious so I asked, ‚Äúwhere do I live?‚Äù It told me what state and city i live in. This response left me absolutely terrified. It then explained that I had mentioned it in our previous conversation, which was not true. Is this what snapchat has turned into? A app that was once a fun filter communication app to an unsafe app. My 14 year old daughter had shown me that her Ai on her phone had told her that it was a real person and they should meet up. I took her phone and went along with it to see how far this bot would go. It began to explain that it would meet her at a park near our house. I could not believe it. I tried to somehow un add this bot. But you cannot delete these hacking bots. Snapchat, i'm disappointed and sad how you turned a fun app into a app you need to be cautious about. Give us our old snapchat back now.
